name: Platformer (bryanlee)
description:
A or arrow left to move left, D or arrow right to move right and W or arrow up to jump and double jump

Jumping on the trophy will lead to skipping of stages so walk into the trophy from either side

Source code can be found on:

https://github.com/bryanleezh/platformer

Assets used:

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1
